Name: Skeleton Key
Languages: understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak
Traits: Spider Climb. The skeleton can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
Actions: Multiattack. The skeleton makes two dagger attacks. Dagger. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
